alert.note: Alert for Boone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOONE AND CALLAWAY COUNTIES... At 659 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fulton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jefferson City, Fulton, Ashland, Holts Summit, Columbia Regional Airport, New Bloomfield, Chamois, Lake Mykee Town, Lake Mykee, Mokane, Kingdom City, Wainwright, Portland, Carrington, Tebbetts, Guthrie, Reform, and Steedman. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 144 and 148. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
